mapper.select: SELECT system_user.username, system_user.`password` FROM `system_user` WHERE system_user.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT system_role.perms FROM system_user LEFT JOIN system_user_role_middle ON system_user_role_middle.user_id = system_user.id LEFT JOIN system_role ON system_role.id = system_user_role_middle.role_id WHERE system_user.username = #{primaryPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT system_menu.perms FROM system_user LEFT JOIN system_user_role_middle ON system_user_role_middle.user_id = system_user.id LEFT JOIN system_role ON system_role.id = system_user_role_middle.role_id LEFT JOIN system_role_menu_middle ON system_role_menu_middle.role_id = system_role.id LEFT JOIN system_menu ON system_menu.id = system_role_menu_middle.menu_id WHERE system_user.username = #{primaryPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
